head.description: This file contains natural language, web and SPARQL query queries for querying a hybrid data sources.

queries.en_query: Give me the price of the book whose title is The Little Prince and whose author is Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?price

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Antoine_de_Saint-Exupéry> .
?book foaf:name "The Little Prince"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:price ?price .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the publisher of the book whose title is The Little Prince and whose author is Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?publisher

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Antoine_de_Saint-Exupéry> .
?book foaf:name "The Little Prince"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?microdata schema:publisher ?publisher .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the price and availability of the book whose title is The Little Prince and whose author is Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?price ?availability

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Antoine_de_Saint-Exupéry> .
?book foaf:name "The Little Prince"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:price ?price .
?offer schema:availability ?availability .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the books available for the book whose title is The Little Prince and whose author is Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?bookName

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Antoine_de_Saint-Exupéry> .
?book foaf:name "The Little Prince"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:availability ?availability .
VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
} .
?microdata schema:name ?bookName .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the price of the books available for the book whose title is The Little Prince and whose author is Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?price

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Antoine_de_Saint-Exupéry> .
?book foaf:name "The Little Prince"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:availability ?availability .
VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
} .
?offer schema:price ?price .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10
